name: Queen of Seas (itch)
description:
Steam Keys are now avaiable!!

Queen of Seas is a casual platformer game made by Uruca Game Studio. The game theme is about Yemanja, the Queen os Seas in afro-brazilian religion. You play as a fisherman's son, that need to dive deep and deliver offerings to the Queen os Seas as a poof of his family's faith. Player must avoid all deep sea danger and collect coins to upgrade his scuba dive suit.
